name: A Pointless Adventure (Playdate)
description:
A Pointless Adventure for Playdate. Is a throwback to classic Atari and intellevison adventure games. Where you must find keys, solve puzzles and dodge enemies and traps, all while being guided by one of the worst Narrators of all time.  

 

Game was made in a week in Playdates Pulp. First of hopefully many games. Try and find all the secret rooms and let me know what you think so I can improve!
